sources.note: Main company website. Overview of Med A-Z Complete with EHR, Practice Management, and Billing modules. Contact info, testimonials from KY and NY practices, pricing model (free EHR with billing service).
ONC mandatory disclosures page. Certification details, CHPL product number, brief product description, security features (MFA), data exchange standards, fee disclosures.
EHR product features page. Detailed clinical features: patient history, diagnostic templates, drug interaction checking, Framingham risk calculator, HL7 interfaces, office floor plan visualization.

FAQ page. Details on billing model (percentage of gross receipts), ISO 9001 certified billing processes, LMRP/CCI scrubbing, Surescripts Gold certification, Quest/LabCorp interfaces, chart scanning for migration.
Alternate domain for same vendor. Similar content to medaz.com. Founded 2002, Hamilton NJ. Three core modules: EHR, Practice Management, Billing.
Med A-Z Complete product overview. Workflow from scheduling through checkout. Check-in, rooming, exam, checkout workflows. HCFA form generation, report compilation.
Alternate domain with EHR features. Additional detail: certified for ambulatory and inpatient, under/over-coding detection, meaningful use features marked.

June 2023 press release on ONC Cures Act certification. KATSI subsidiary, development centers in US/Canada/Europe/India. Real-time floor plan, patient summaries, Framingham calculator, drug interaction warnings.

April 2010 press release. EBM IPA (NYC, 100+ physicians) selected MedAZ suite including PHR patient portal. Mentions data aggregation and quality indicator reporting. Modules called EHR Plus, Practice Plus, Billing Plus.
SelectHub listing for Med A-Z. Returned 403 error — could not access content. Listing exists but details unavailable.
MedicalRecords.com listing. Page loaded but only rendered JavaScript framework code — no usable product information extracted.
